content: this simple pattern provides practice opportunity for a foundation stitch and working in back loop all while applying an easy and good looking half-double stitch when completed you ll have a great ribbed scarf for him or her this pattern is written in us terms skill level for this scarf is beginner yarn worsted/aran colors a & b yardage 170 & 68 yards hook i/9 5 5mm final size 6 x 72
